cause.description:
it is beilived that every 2 seconds you snap a perosn in kenya dies! it is very heart braking, but in order to help this we need to raise money! people in kenya need food adn better shelter to survive today.. so by sending money we can get them medicine and doctors to help their diseases if we can!!
1. to save lives in our world
2. they need to be helped to survive
3. for a good cause
cause.name: help unfortunate kids in Kenya
